Content: They have to complete the network upgrade.

Author: revaen#6538
Content: Okay thanks for the super quick reply

Author: criptobear#6402
Content: to receive the rev shares holding DEX is ok to hold them in chameleon or they need to be held in agama?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@criptobear they will be airdropped to the same DEX address on the Komodo blockchain
so, if you have access to the same komodo address as your dex address, you will receive it

Author: criptobear#6402
Content: thx

Author: criptobear#6402
Content: is there any kind of stable coin on komodo platform with a defi on top of it, sort of like compound on ethereum?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: #cc-pegs  is to create a stable coin (in development)

Author: criptobear#6402
Content: and DEFI? i think it is very good thing for people like me that for example want to put some fiat money from the bank in something that would give some earning (reasonably low) percentage but with zero or very low risk, like banks where doing some year ago, for holding a stable coin. Buying any coin or token is very risky, i saw the value of my investments in crypto going to near zero in 2 years as i think almost everybody experienced.

Author: criptobear#6402
Content: just realized i am asking in support channel, sorry

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
once the cc-pegs is well tested and the stable coin works as expected, DEFI applications are the next target
either as Antara modules themselves or as instances of FSM module that is currently under development
FSM cc enables near turing complete on-chain smart contract creation

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: no problem 🙂

Author: criptobear#6402
Content: FSM=?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
FSM stands for "Finite-state machine"
<https://brilliant.org/wiki/finite-state-machines/>
<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finite-state_machine?oldformat=true>

Author: fila#1264
Content:
dear, , i downloaded latest agama wallet, sent there my kmd, after a few minutes all these kmd transfered away without me, my balance is 0.
how is it possible??? please help

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: which version did you download?

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: did you use a previously used address?if so when was it generated?

Content: yes i did

Author: fila#1264
Content: i used my old address

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: you old address was probably compromised

Author: fila#1264
Content: no

Author: fila#1264
Content: noo

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: when did you generate the old address?

Author: fila#1264
Content: a year ago

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: and before using 0.5.9-2 have you used other version?

Author: fila#1264
Content: yes an beta 0.3.2 or something

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: I believe that version was compromised, so any address created or accessed using that version will be compromised

Author: fila#1264
Content: im gonna kill myself because a lot of money for me

Author: fila#1264
Content: can we track the thief and restore the transaction?

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: how many kmd was lost?

Author: fila#1264
Content: about 1100

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: @Moderator what's your suggestion for next step?

Author: fila#1264
Content: https://www.kmdexplorer.io/tx/f120da486875bf05735e5864d69a77c989891f8a5584adb398130186887596ae

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: it is the hacker address, you'll notice that the fund being moved every block

Author: fila#1264
Content: my bad. how is it possible to get an address compromised? my god

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: https://komodoplatform.com/update-agama-vulnerability/

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: this happened last june

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: It was announced many times. I am sorry that you didn't get to learn about it

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: @𝙊𝙞𝙣𝙠 👆

Author: 𝙊𝙞𝙣𝙠#3612
Content: Just noticed after I posted in Verus...

Author: 𝙊𝙞𝙣𝙠#3612
Content: OK, read the conversation. You did all I could have done already.

Author: 𝙊𝙞𝙣𝙠#3612
Content: followed the transfers. It's still being transfered to new addresses. Right now it's heading to https://www.kmdexplorer.io/address/REvqqintzZ8UPSdKcRnrvdntUsJ7gwD1ZP

Author: fila#1264
Content: thanks for your time. Agama wallet shouldn’t allow me to use any compromised address 😦 I maybe missed the hack announcement on Twitter but there wasn’t any warning in the new wallet version to better change my address 😞

Author: Dyeles#8347
Content: Hello guys, reading all this brings memories of that episode and how well it was handled by the team, unfortunately it seems that not everybody got to be connected or aware of the hack. Recently one of my Japanese buddies I introduced to Komodo back during the ICO returned from Japan and is asking if you guys are in control of this address: RBkXoXwwhBTRvKDqMbzAyKqChGdW1X3kqZ. My KMD's where sent to safety address back then, and all got returned to me thanks to SHossain  and JL but I can't recall this address as safe one. My friend returned, got his funds out of Bittrex and according to him, as SOON as they arrived into his compromised wallet, they were swapped to the mentioned address. Any feedback I can give him on that. Thanks!

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: Unfortunately all the compromised addresses have been scripted to auto transfer to the hacker address

Author: Dyeles#8347
Content: @Gordon Komodo , thanks, that's what I figured with my limited programing knowledge. I just needed to confirmed that was not an address controlled by the team. At least I can bring bad news and a reason. Cheers

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: sorry to be the bearer of bad news, but I have suggested to verus wallet dev to maybe include a wallet notification to suggest user to create new address if their addresses have been created/used using compromised version of the wallet.

Author: Dyeles#8347
Content: I think the biggest problem is for those that are/were not aware of the hack at all, I haven't seen him in a LONG time. He just assumed everything was just fine, went to Bittrex, got his funds and then puff. Obviously he is not in discord or twitter and I completely forgot about him ( At that moment I was just worried about my own funds lol). It is what it is, he knew the risk and he will be fine about it, for what I can track it was only under 500KMD. Man, it will hurt when KMD reaches 20$. Thank you @Gordon Komodo , you gotta appreciate this community.

Author: fila#1264
Content: So hackers wrote script to automatically transfer funds from all compromised addresses, wow. Hard. A crypto hodlers’ night mare

Author: fila#1264
Content: I had bad dreams tonight. Komodo is my favourite project and I bought some everytime I could and now it’s gonne. Hard lesson 😬. Doesn’t Komodo have a bounty program for scammed fans? 😅

Author: Martis#7710
Content: Hello. I'm using Agama wallet 0.5.9-2 from Veruscoin for KMD native mode. Every time I start wallet, sync of blocks is starting from around 1.45M block height. After full sync I close the wallet and when I open it again, it start syncing again from 1.45M block height. What could be a problem here? Windows 10, 64 bit.

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @Martis reindexing the blockchain should help

Author: Martis#7710
Content: Coin is already added into my wallet. Is there any other place for reindexing?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
just shutdown the wallet and start it again
click on "Activate coin"
you should see this screen

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@Martis if you are using komodo native mode, the komodo ocean qt wallet is a better choice
https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/folders/29000055898

Author: Martis#7710
Content: Does Ocean QT wallet have claim KMD possibility?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@Martis yes, just send the whole balance to yourself
<https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000030305-use-komodo-ocean-qt-wallet-to-claim-rewards>

Author: Martis#7710
Content: Started Ocean wallet. I see only "activating the best chain" for long long time and nothing more happens.

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @Martis which OS are you using?

Author: Martis#7710
Content: windows 10, 64 bity

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
reindex the wallet, it may take a long time
but once done, it should work properly
https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000030462-starting-the-komodooceanqt-wallet-with-command-line-parameters-in-windows

Author: Martis#7710
Content: Ok, Now it's syncing headers
